testcase.name: test_On_Start

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: interface org.testng.ITestContext.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 20 JVM vendor name : Oracle Corporation JVM vendor version : 20+36-2344 JVM name : Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 20+36-2344 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Windows 10 OS version : 10.0
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [interface org.testng.ITestContext, interface org.testng.IAttributes]
